description: inferring features from microbiota time-series data linked to host status | The Microbiome Interpretable Temporal Rule Engine | Input code and results from simulations supporting the MITRE paper | Supporting files for the Microbiome Interpretable Temporal Rule Engine manuscript | MITRE learns predictive models of patient outcomes from microbiome time-series data in the form of short lists of interpretable rules | This repository includes the configuration files used to set up simulations for the MITRE manuscript, and results from those simulations, with a few useful auxiliary files | MITRE will load data from Bokulich, N. A., et al., "Antibiotics, birth mode, and diet shape microbiome maturation during early life." Science Translational Medicine 8(343): 343ra82, which is packaged with MITRE
name: MITRE
